name: Seaside Fireflies
description:
A seagull meets a girl on the beach who's having a heck of a time gathering fireflies along the seashore.  Undeterred, our hero offers to help her collect every firefly on the beach!

Credits:

  • Programming & Art
    •  Piggybank (@MarkandFlops)
  • Music & Sound
    • Daryl Barnes (@darylbarnes_)

Made for Mini Jam 108 using Construct 3.
